entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Petawawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:34 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.9°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow mixed with freezing drizzle. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 8:25 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:25 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Overcast. Low minus 12.
